sourcesContent:
fa fa-info-circle


{{selectedService.name}}

{{selectedService.description}}

Snack preference: {{selectedService.snackPreference}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceDataService } from './service-data.service'; import { Service } from './service.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-viewdescription', templateUrl: './viewdescription.component.html', styleUrls: ['./viewdescription.component.css'] }) export class ViewdescriptionComponent { selectedService: Service = { name: '', description: '', snackPreference: '' }; showInfo = false; constructor(private serviceDataService: ServiceDataService) { } showServiceInfo() { this.selectedService = this.serviceDataService.getSelectedService(); this.showInfo = true; } hideServiceInfo() { this.showInfo = false; } }
